Sink calculator
Hello blank fragment
//Tutorial: Type the name of the item you are about to mage. Pick the item category.
Here is the overview panel.
Current sink. 

This is the most important resource when maging an item. 

Sink value would be different in color depending on changes during the maging. Available runes would be listed here: However, no characteristics have been chosen yet. 
Let's pick something! 

Press 'Edit Rune List' button.
All available stats are shown in the list: Pick only the ones used in the magus process of current item. To do so just click '+' button on desired stats and they will move to 'Selected' section. 
To deselect the stat just click '-' button. Once everything is set, confirm your choice by clicking 'Apply' button.
All available runes corresponding to stat selected are shown in the list: This shows the rune name and number of stats that will be added to item on success. This shows the rune base positive sink. 

It is specific to each stat. This shows the rune total positive sink. 

Basically, this is the amount of sink being consumed to be able to apply this particular rune. To apply the rune and calculate the outcome press on the rune row, that is corresponding to regular magus action in the game when you have some stats added and removed. 

Try it out now!
Here you can modify your stat values according to magus outcome If you modify a stat which is positive on an item, use this field to enter the result. 

Value will be positive if you improve an itemâ€™s stat and negative otherwise. 

This field should be the one you use the most. Use this field ONLY if you modify a stat which is negative on an item. 

Negative sink will be considered in calculations in this case. Since negative sink won't be used very often, 'Negative sink block' is hidden by default. 

You can display it using this Advanced Switch But what to do with CRITICAL FAILURES? 

This is a magus outcome when you have no stats modified, but lose sink equal to rune power. To apply critical failure, just PRESS AND HOLD corresponding rune row. 

In the appeared dialog box you can choose which type of sink you are going to use (positive or negative) with the toggle button. 

Confirm your decision to apply the action. 

Try it out now! Every single magus action performed in the app is being recorded as a log. 

You can check it out on the History page. 

Press 'History' button to look at it right now! Logs are being shown here. This is the very beginning of the history. 

The most recent row is on the top. Here is the history message. Here is the result sink. History messages with positive output (where the target stat has been increased) are green. 

Negative output (all stats or just sink went down) are red. Now press 'Back' button to move back to the main screen. CONGRATULATIONS! 

Here is the end of tutorial. 
You have successfully learned the basics and are ready to perform magus by yourself. 

Tutorial can be run again from title screen anytime. 

Feel free to reach out to me if you still have questions or thoughts regarding app improvements.
